<<<<<<< HEAD
A discourse of Bathe, and the hot waters there also some enquiries into the nature of the water of St. Vincent's rock, near Bristol, and that of Castle-Cary : to which is added a century of observations, more fully declaring the nature, property, and distinction of the Baths : with an account of the lives, and character, of the physicians of Bathe / by Tho. Gvidott ... Guidott, Thomas, fl. 1698.
[32], 200 p. plates
Printed for Henry Brome ..., London : 1676.
Added t.p. engr. "The lives and character of the physicians of Bathe," has special t.p. dated 1677 and "A century of observations" has special t.p. dated 1676. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
A discourse of Bathe, and the hot waters there also some enquiries into the nature of the water of St. Vincent's rock, near Bristol, and that of Castle-Cary : to which is added a century of observations, more fully declaring the nature, property, and distinction of the Baths : with an account of the lives, and character, of the physicians of Bathe / by Tho. Gvidott ... Guidott, Thomas, fl. 1698.
[32], 200 p. plates
Printed for Henry Brome ..., London : 1676.
Added t.p. engr. "The lives and character of the physicians of Bathe," has special t.p. dated 1677 and "A century of observations" has special t.p. dated 1676. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
